ActJudges Act
SubjectBarbara Meredith ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Kenneth E. Meredith **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to BARBARA MEREDITH, widow of the Hon. Kenneth E. Meredith, Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 4, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
